Articles.Content:
Hello Fellow Kerbanauts,

I'm thrilled to have been selected for this program and sincerely hope that my launch pad lessons are few (not likely). I've installed on an iMac, but have found that my son's can't fully use the game when they use there log ins. I can get to the point of starting a new game, but nothing ever loads, even with admin permissions. I've even tried creating their games using my user, then I can access the saved game, but functionalities such return to Main Menu do not function. I've searched the web and the forum to no avail. I'm I stuck just using the main user account or is there a solution. I welcome any and all Kerbaunaut advice for this new explorer.

Thanks,

Kerbanaut Relpek

This is a strange issue. I know squat about iMac OS, but is it possible to copy over or reinstall the KSP directory into their accounts directly? I use a private laptop, so I don't have any admin issues (I'm the admin.)

Again, I have no skills with Macs, so don't rely on my judgement. Welcome to the forum anyway, though.
Thanks Starwhip, I was thinking along the same lines, but just haven't had a chance to mess with it. We've got our own games using my admin user, so at least we're having fun.
